use-case.name: Login
use-case.description: This use case allows an employee to have access to restricted operations on the Health-Watcher system.

basic-flow.flow: The employee provides the login and password
The login and password are sent to the server
The system retrieves the employee details using the login as a unique identifier
The system validates the entered password
The result of the login attempt is presented to the employee on their local display

alternative-flow.flow: A problem occurs retrieving the employee details
The system cannot validate the employee
